name: Cyberdrunk
description:
This project was made in 48 hours by college students during the Mix and Game Jam 2020

Avoid the bouncers, collect alcohol and escape while following the music in order not to be detected !

HOW TO PLAY :
- ZQSD / Arrow keys to move
- SHIFT to run
- SPACE to grab a bottle

Search bottles in the map, grab some and leave.
The more bottles you carry, the more noise you make and therefore, you can only move while the music is louder.
Moreover, you have to hide between the dancers to avoid the bouncers.

CREDITS :
- Game Design : Luc C., Gaëtan P., Marine S. and Jeffrey Z.
- Coding : Marine S. and Gaëtan P.
- Art : Jeffrey Z.
- Sound Design : Gaëtan P.
